reviews.text: I was fortunate enough to book this hotel at less than half of the normal rate via a discount website. I stayed two separate nights here on both ends of my trip to the Nashville area.
reviews.title: Worth the Price I Paid

reviews.text: On my first stay, we were given a double but had a king for the second stay. The rooms are a nice size and have Sleep Number beds. I can never figure those things out but I can sleep on almost anything.
reviews.title: A convenient airport hotel

reviews.text: The rooms could be cleaner. Behind the night stand in our second stay I found an impressive amount of dust.
reviews.title: Rating of 3 for price I paid, would have been a 2 if I paid full price.

reviews.text: We took advantage of the indoor pool which I thought was really nice with good music playing and water at a nice temperature. The hot tub was nice as well.
reviews.title: OK for the price

reviews.text: Location is great near the airport. Free parking. Did not take advantage of the shuttle, bar or restaurants. They have a computer/printer near the front desk for printing out boarding passes.
reviews.title: Good Deal, Great Beds

likes.liked: — Location, beds and pool with jacuzzi
likes.disliked: — the HVAC on the top floor is a little noise, it's quiter on the other floors

reviews.text: This hotel was average. The room overall was nice and clean but the bathroom was outdated. There were cracks in the ceiling and evidence of mold around some of the tile. The lighting was also very old and the tub did not drain well. The bed was comfortable although I expected more since they placed a lot of emphasis on the comfort of the bed.
reviews.title: Average Hotel

reviews.text: We stayed one night at this place (hotel?) before leaving for Europe.
reviews.title: Never a Radisson inmate be!................

likes.disliked: — Stale, boring airport style and cluttered with promotional literature for the mattresses

reviews.text: Check in was quick and efficient - a change for Radisson who normally like their customers to stand in line for the privelege of entering their facilties.
reviews.title: Wonderful staff, beds, and shower

reviews.text: Room was stale smelling (not from smoke!) and overlooked the airconditioning units of rooms below.
reviews.title: Close to the airport and decent room size

reviews.text: The small bedside table was cluttered with cables and promotional literature from the mattress suppliers. Why not promote the furniture, carpets, wallpaper etc? The Radisson costcutters could probably reduce the capital cost per room to zero.................
reviews.title: Convenience at a price

reviews.text: We booked this room on Priceline last minute. The room was very nice and the beds are very comfortable (they are the sleep number beds). They brought up a crib as well as a small "dorm" refrigerator for free. We used the pool one day and the water was very nice, not cold but not too warm. It is located very close to the airport and they have a shuttle, I believe, although we didn't use it. Overall, we had a good stay!
reviews.title: Nice room, good service

likes.disliked: — Our view was of the roof... but I don't sit in my room looking out the window

reviews.text: Room was clean and staff was friendly.
reviews.title: Adequate But Nothing Special

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is just ok. It is showing its age. Everything is clean and in good order. The staff were efficient. The room was fine. They have the Sleep Number bed. I was not impressed, but that's me. The shower was fine. Towels were large, but a little thin and scratchy. The climate control in the room worked well. We stayed on the 7th floor. It was a little noisy due to the hotel machinery on the roof. The neighborhood is safe, but a little rundown. We ate breakfast at nearby Shoney's. It was fine. We got this room via Priceline bidding. It was worth the $60.00 we paid, but I would not pay full rack price, nor would I be in any hurry to return.
reviews.title: Okay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for a week-end getaway. I will have to say we were very impressed with this hotel. The rooms were very nice and the beds comfy with down comforters and all. The staff was friendly and helpful. The lobby area, as well as our room was very clean. This is a very nice hotel and appears to have just been remodeled. It is located close to the Opry Mills area, and downtown, so for us the location was great. We did not use the pool or hot tub, but they looked very nice and clean also. We would stay here again. The rates were GREAT!!
reviews.title: Very Nice!!!

reviews.text: Happy travels!!
reviews.title: Very Pleased With Airport hotel!!!!!!!

reviews.text: Hotel is conveniently located near airport. Has a nice pool area and small workout room. Wendy's, Shoney's, and nice Barbie Q's down the street with a good value. Very clean, except for the ants and small moths in room. Was on 5th floor near exits, so I don't know if that was the reason for the bugs. The noise from the water system, toilets flushing and showers, was louder than normal. The sleep by number beds are an added comfort.
reviews.title: Lots of ants.

reviews.text: I was in Nashville for a an educator's conference and we luckily chose this hotel to stay in. I love trip adivsor and try to read reviews before I go to get a feel for the hotel. I was nervous reading some of the previous reviews,but was happily surprised i did not find one of things the others wrote about to be true for me. The place was spotless and well decorated. As a I heard another teacher complain on the shuttle to the convention about the towels in other chain's rooms only being good for washing cars,the sheets were soft and the towels fluffy and large in size. I ate breakfast at the buffet in the morning ,the food was good and the wait staff so helpful and friendly.
reviews.title: What a great stay!

likes.liked: — serive, room layout and cleaniness,food service
likes.disliked: — no outdoor pool, distance from other restaurants

reviews.text: In addition, the front desk staff was so nice and friendly and try to help guests immediately. I would tell anyone visiting Nashville to stay here and will return to this hotel if I ever get the chance to visit Nashville again.
reviews.title: Very nice hotel Great location

likes.disliked: — The sounds of water when another room turns on the shower or flushes

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I went to Nashville to visit my son.This hotel was very nice,clean & had a good staff.I stayed on the seventh floor near the exit.The room & bathroom was fairly large for two peope.This was the first time that I had ever slept in a sleep number bed.I found my number but my only complaint about the bed was if you had it on soft the edges stayed hard.
reviews.title: 3rd class all the way

reviews.text: Since I was visiting my son I would leave early morning & go back to the hotel late at night.I found it to be very safe & well lighted.
reviews.title: Fair Enough
